divs: Sighting Detailsi was awaken from my sleep late in the night,my body body was shaking uncontrollably,felt as though i was having a seizure,i could do nothing but cut my eyes around the room and i noticed a small white figure pointing something at me.i started yelling but my mouth wouldnt open,after a short time a was able to gradually open my mouth and yell louder,then everything went back to normal. this event happened twice in the same week but not as dramatic as the first time. the being was about 3 ft tall,slim build and big dark eyes with what appeared to be maybe a white suit
Summary: small entity standing at my bedroom door staring at me
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lawrenceburg
There were no other sightings in Lawrenceburg on or around August 20th 2006
